question: あなたの英語の自信度を選択してください．
あなたの国語の自信度を選択してください．
Let's go ahead and do it. Nothing _____ by just wating.
This work calls for great _____. Do you think you will fit for it?
Alice trusts you; only you can _____ her to give up the foolish idea.
We _____ playing baseball for about half an hour when it started to rain very heavily

A: We're having a party on Saturday night. Can you come?
  B: _____
  A: Oh well, maybe next time!
choices: A. I think it's a very good idea.
B. I'm sorry, I'm busy this weekend.
C. No. I can't. I never go to parties.
D. Yes, of course I can come.

question: テスト全体の自信度を選択してください。
